high_descs: Move to the right a bit to stand in front of the left side of the dresser.
Pick up the pen that is on the left side of the dresser.
Move over to face the side of the left-hand side of the dresser.
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pen using the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Walk to the right a few steps and turn left to go to the cabinet.
Pick up the pen in front of the lamp on top of the cabinet.
Walk to the left, turn right at the end of the cabinet and face the other side of the cabinet.
Light up the lamp on the cabinet.
anns.task_desc: Light up the lamp on the cabinet while holding a pen.

high_descs: go to the front of the dresser
pick up the white ink pen from the dresser
take the pen to the nightstand with the lamp
turn on the lamp to examine the pen
anns.task_desc: get the pen from the dresser and examine it under the lamp
